content.query:
-- =============================================================================
-- OpenHack MDWH
-- Azure Synapse Analytics Demo
-- https://github.com/aessing/demo-azuresynapse
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Developer.......: Andre Essing (https://www.andre-essing.de/)
--                                (https://github.com/aessing)
--                                (https://twitter.com/aessing)
--                                (https://www.linkedin.com/in/aessing/)
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- THIS CODE AND INFORMATION ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND,
-- EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE IMPLIED
-- WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND/OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
-- =============================================================================

-- TRUNCATE TABLE [dbo].[FactStreaming];

-- Load table
DECLARE @MaxSK INT;
SELECT @MaxSK = ISNULL(MAX(StreamingSK), 0) FROM [dbo].[FactStreaming]

INSERT INTO [dbo].[FactStreaming] (
    [StreamingSK],
    [TransactionID],
    [CustomerSK],
    [MovieSK],
    [StreamStartDateSK],
    [StreamStartTimeSK],
    [StreamEndDateSK],
    [StreamEndTimeSK],
    [StreamDurationSec],
    [StreamDurationMin]
)
SELECT * FROM (
	SELECT 
		@MaxSK + ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ExternalTable.TransactionID) AS StreamingSK,
		ExternalTable.TransactionID AS TransactionID,
		ExternalTable.CustomerSK AS CustomerSK,
		ExternalTable.MovieSK AS MovieSK,
		ExternalTable.StreamStartDateSK AS StreamStartDateSK,
		ExternalTable.StreamStartTimeSK AS StreamStartTimeSK,
		ExternalTable.StreamEndDateSk AS StreamEndDateSk,
		ExternalTable.StreamEndTimeSk AS StreamEndTimeSk,
		ExternalTable.StreamDurationSec AS StreamDurationSec,
		ExternalTable.StreamDurationMin AS StreamDurationMin
	FROM (
		SELECT
			SourceSystemTransactionID AS TransactionID,
			(
				SELECT TOP 1
					CustomerSK 
				FROM 
					[dbo].[DimCustomers] dcust
				JOIN
					[ext].[Customers] cust
					ON dcust.LastName = cust.LastName
					AND dcust.FirstName = cust.FirstName
					AND dcust.ZipCode = cust.ZipCode
					AND dcust.City = cust.City
					AND dcust.State = cust.State
				WHERE
					str.CustomerID = cust.SourceSystemCustomerID
			) AS CustomerSK,
			(
				SELECT TOP 1
					MovieSK 
				FROM 
					[dbo].[DimMovies] mov 
				JOIN
					[ext].[Catalog] cat 
					ON mov.MovieTitle = cat.Title 
				WHERE
					str.MovieID = cat.SourceSystemMovieID
			) AS MovieSK,
			strstadat.DateSK AS StreamStartDateSK,
			strstatim.TimeSK AS StreamStartTimeSK,
			strenddat.DateSK AS StreamEndDateSk,
			strendtim.TimeSK AS StreamEndTimeSk,
			DATEDIFF(second, StreamStart, StreamEnd) AS StreamDurationSec,
			convert(DECIMAL(9,4), DATEDIFF(second, StreamStart, StreamEnd) / 60.0) AS StreamDurationMin
		FROM
			[ext].[Streaming] str
		LEFT JOIN
			[dbo].[DimDate] strstadat
			ON convert(date, str.StreamStart) = strstadat.DateValue
		LEFT JOIN
			[dbo].[DimTime] strstatim
			ON convert(time, str.StreamStart) = strstatim.TimeValue
		LEFT JOIN
			[dbo].[DimDate] strenddat
			ON convert(date, str.StreamEnd) = strenddat.DateValue
		LEFT JOIN
			[dbo].[DimTime] strendtim
			ON convert(time, str.StreamEnd) = strendtim.TimeValue
	) ExternalTable
) CleansedTable
WHERE CleansedTable.TransactionID NOT IN (SELECT TransactionID FROM [dbo].[FactStreaming])

-- Check Load
-- SELECT COUNT(*) FROM [dbo].[FactStreaming]
